title: Mr.Tickle
info: Mr.Tickle's story stops and really begins with him in bed and making himself breakfast without getting up because of his extraordinarily long arms

title: Mr.Greedy
info: The story begins with Mr. Greedy waking up and having his overly large daily breakfast

title: Mr.Topsy-Turvy
info: Mr.Topsy-Turvy does everything the wrong way. One day he comes to the town where the reader lives"

title: Little Miss Bossy
info: Little Miss Bossy is very bossy (hence her name) and she is as rude as Mr Uppity

title: Mr.Uppity
info: Mr.Uppity lives in Bigtown and he is very rich. He is rude to everybody (they call him Miserable old Uppity) until one day he meets a goblin
